text: Angela Carter (7 May 1940 â€“ 16 February 1992; formerly Angela Olive Stalker) was a British author who changed themes from folk tales and gave them dark and sexual twists. She was born in in Eastbourne, Sussex, England and died in London. == References == Category:1940 births Category:1992 deaths Category:British feminists Category:British socialists Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:English novelists Category:English science fiction writers Category:English short story writers Category:Feminist writers Category:People from Eastbourne Category:British translators Category:British linguists Category:Writers from Sussex
